metadata.title: CVE-2020-27618 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The iconv function in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) 2.32 andearlier, when processing invalid multi-byte input sequences in IBM1364,IBM1371, IBM1388, IBM1390, and IBM1399 encodings, fails to advance theinput state, which could lead to an infinite loop in applications,resulting in a denial of service, a different vulnerability fromCVE-2016-10228.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
